descriptionlist.description:
Compatible with iOS 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 & 9
Dock is a app like Dock of Mac OSX,that can manage the background processes, app shortcuts, quickly switching between apps. Operation simple and quick.
-Now support iPad. -Multi-task manage,background app quickly switch. -Customizable app shortcuts, you can add many app as shortcuts. -Quickly open app and quickly switch between apps, in the lock-screen can also be operational. -More than one way to show Dock,double tap Statusbar,short hold Statusbar,double tap home button,short hold home button,left/right corner slide up, QuickDo gestures. -A variety of display, rotating icons and does not rotate. -iOS4 folder support,themes support.
